page.title: 13OVERBURY SCHOOL SPORTS DAY
page.content: Once a year,early in July,we hold our{ {School Sports Day.}We all go over to the Playing Fields to race.Our families are usually there waiting to watch us and cheer us on.We sit down on mats waiting to begin.We are divided into groups of 5 to 7 for the events.We have a Slow Cycle Race,High Jump,Running Races,Skipping Races, Parents'and Toddlers'Races,Obstacle Races,Egg and Spoon Races and Sack Race.If we come 1st,2nd or 3rd we get a rosette.At the end of the afternoon we all gather together around a table and the person who has done best is awarded a cup.Other cups are awarded for various other things.We then take all the mats and equipment back to school.We have ice-cream and other refreshments on the lawn to cool us down.
